Reference

Matrices

General functions for dealing with matrices.

Create a Block Matrix

rotateMatrix()

Rotate a Matrix

analyzeProjectionMatrix()

Linear Matrix Analysis

calcMatrixSensitivity()

Linear Sensitivity Analysis

matPower()

Matrix Power

zeros()

Diagonal Matrix of Zeros

diagR()

Create Matrix from Vector

matrixX()

Matrix Multiplication

rMat()

Create Random Matrix

calcRo()

Net Reproductive Rate (Ro)

Tribolium Mating Subroutine

PunnettPack()

Packing Punnett Map Solutions (FEScUE)

Data Manipulation

This was before dplyr.

searchReplace()

Search & Replace

Apply Function to Subsets of Data

mergeMetaData()

Merge Meta Data

Convenience Wrapper for mapply() (deprecate -> purrr::pmap())

Map Vector

capwords()

Capitalize Title Format

seconds2time() time2seconds()

whichEntry()

Which Entry(s)

collapse2df()
